action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be a pixelated representation of four Tetris blocks in different orientations and colors. From left to right: a green 'T' shaped block, a purple 'T' shaped block, a green 'L' shaped block, and an orange 'L' shaped block. In the top right corner, there is a pink 'T' shaped block. The background is white, and the blocks are not aligned in any particular pattern that would suggest gameplay.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixelated composition with various colored blocks arranged in a seemingly random pattern. There is a purple plus sign at the top, followed by a series of green blocks arranged in a zigzag pattern. Below the green, there is a pink block with a small dark speck inside it. To the right, there is a pink T-shaped figure. In the bottom left corner, there is an orange zigzag line, and in the bottom right, there is a light pink T-shaped figure.
